title: Why is it that I cant play the free week?
body:
My account is lvl 9 now yet I still cant play the  active free week?

Edit: It also says my account is lvl 6 on the boards?

replies.body:
We recently changed the free champ rotation to include a new list of champs for players level 10 and under. The usual list of rotating champs now starts at level 11!

About your boards level, that is actually linked to your client Summoner Level. Sometimes it gets a little out of sync, but posting here or using the Profile Syncing Tool up top of H&S will do the trick!
